column2: "Nna Ammonhen Nahas nye no dɔm bae
column3: na wɔbɛkyeer Jabes a ɔwɔ Gilead do nsera: na Jabes mbarimba no nyinara see Nahas dɛ
Dza mibegyina do nye hom edzi ahyɛmu no nye dɛ wobotutu hom enyiwa enyimfa nyinara; na medze bɛyɛ enyimguase ato Israel nyinara do."

column2: "Na Jabes mpanyimfo no see no dɛ
column3: Ma hɛn mu kwan nda esuon
column4: ma yentutu abɔfo ma wɔnkɔ Israel ntoaado nyinara: na sɛ obi nnyi hɔ a ɔbɛgye hɛn nkwa a

column2: "Nna abɔfo no baa Saul no kurow Gibea mu
column3: na wɔbɛkaa nsɛm yi wɔ ɔman no asomu: na ɔman no nyinara memaa hɔn ndze do na wosui."

column4: Saul ka anantwi do fi haban mu reba; na Saul bisaa dɛ
column5: Ebɛnadze na ɔyɛ ɔman yi ma worusu yi? Na wɔkaa Jabesfo nsɛm no kyerɛɛ no."

column3: Nyankopɔn sunsum baa no do dzendzenndzen

column4: na ɔdze hyɛɛ abɔfo nsa somae ma wɔdze kekyimaa Israel ntoaado nyinara
column6: Obiara a oemmfir edzi emmbedzi Saul na Samuel ekyir no mbrɛ wɔbɛyɛ n'anantwi nye yi. Na EWURADZE no ho hu tɔɔ ɔman no do
column7: na wopuei baa dɛ nyimpa kor."

column2: "Na Saul kaan hɔn wɔ Bezek; nna Israel mbarimba no yɛ mpemahaasa
column3: na Juda mbarimba no so yɛ mpemeduasa."

column2: "Na wɔsee abɔfo a wɔbae no dɛ
column3: Dza wɔnkɛka nkyerɛ Jabes a ɔwɔ Gilead nye yi
column4: Ɔkyena obodu aber a iwi ano reyɛ dzen no
column5: nna wɔagye hom. Na abɔfo no bae na wɔbɛkaa kyerɛɛ Jabesfo; na ɔyɛɛ hɔn dɛw."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi Jabesfo no see Nahas na no dɔm no dɛ
column3: Ɔkyena yebefir edzi aba hom nkyɛn
column4: ma hom aayɛ hɛn dza homara hwɛ a oye nyinara."

column2: "Na n'adzekyeenyim no ɔbaa dɛ Saul buee no dɔm no mu ekuw ebiasa; na wɔbaa nsera no mu anapa dasu mu
column3: na wɔbae bokunkum Ammonfo no araa ma okodur adzekyee ne hyew no: na ɔbaa dɛ
column4: hɔn a wɔkae no wɔbɔe petsee
column5: ma hɔn mu beenu mpo annka fakor."

column4: Aso Saul na obedzi hɛn do hen no? Wɔmfa dɛm nyimpa no mbra ma yenku hɔn."

column3: Worunnku nyimpa biara ndɛ da yi: osiandɛ ndɛ EWURADZE ayɛ nkwagye edwuma wɔ Israel."

column4: na yɛnkɛyɛ ahendzi no fofor wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Na ɔman no nyinara kɔr Gilgal; na hɔ na wɔhyɛɛ Saul ɔhen wɔ EWURADZE enyim wɔ Gilgal; na hɔ na wɔbobɔɔ asomdwee afɔr wɔ EWURADZE enyim
column3: na hɔ na Saul na Israel mbarimba nyinara dzii ehurusi kɛsenara."
